recipe_name: Orange Crush! Fresh Squeezed Orange and Vodka Cocktail
ingredients: 2 cups ice cubes, or as needed, 2 fluid ounces orange-flavored vodka, 1 fluid ounce triple sec liqueur, 2  Valencia oranges, juiced, 1 splash lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®), 1 slice orange
